name: GoogleOAuth2
description:
The Google Toolbox for Mac OAuth 2 Controllers make it easy for Cocoa
applications to sign in to services using OAuth 2 for authentication
and authorization.

This version can be used with iOS ≥ 5.0 or OS X ≥ 10.7.
To target earlier versions of iOS or OS X, use

pod 'gtm-oauth2', '~> 1.0.125'
  
podspec version based on source SVN revision
